sentences.en: ...the sub-atomic particles that make up matter.
A neutron is simply a neutral particle in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.cn: 中子就是原子核里不带电的粒子。

sentences.en: A particle should be accompanied in nature by a sister particle.
sentences.cn: 一种粒子实际上必须伴随一种姐妹粒子.

sentences.en: A proton is an elementary particle of matter.
sentences.cn: 质子是物质的基本粒子。

sentences.en: Another particle grouping is referred to as charge multiplets.
sentences.cn: 粒子的另一分类叫做电荷多重态.

sentences.en: For many particle physicists, however, it was a year of frustration.
sentences.cn: 对于许多粒子物理学家来说, 这是受挫折的一年.

sentences.en: In quantum mechanics the particle need not have a definite energy.
sentences.cn: 在量子力学中,粒子并不需要具有确定的能量.

sentences.en: Particle concentrations in the upper atmosphere drop regularly as the altitude rises.
sentences.cn: 在高层大气中粒子浓度随高度的增加而有规律地下降.

sentences.en: The particle is never to be found halfway between the walls.
sentences.cn: 在两壁间的中点永远找不到粒子.

sentences.en: The particle radius unit, the micron, is especially common and useful.
sentences.cn: 粒子半径的单位是微米, 微米这个单位尤其普通和有用.

sentences.en: the sub-atomic particles that make up matter
sentences.cn: 构成物质的次原子微粒

sentences.en: The technique requires the coupling of a particle accelerator and a mass spectrometer.
sentences.cn: 这种技术要求将粒子加速器和质谱仪连接起来。

sentences.en: The wave nature of the particle produces a bunching effect.
sentences.cn: 粒子的波动性质产生了成群的效应.

sentences.en: There is a particle of truth in his statement.
sentences.cn: 他的陈述中有一点点实话。

sentences.en: They require massive complicated particle detectors weighing tens or hundreds of tons.
sentences.cn: 它们需要规模巨大的、复杂的粒子探测器,其重量达几十吨、几百吨.

sentences.en: This particle has a very small mass.
Today many radioisotopes are produced using the particle accelerator called a cyclotron.
sentences.cn: 今天许多放射性同位素是用被称为回旋加速器的粒子加速器来制造的.

words.tran_cn: 粒子,微粒,极小量,痕迹,迹象

phrases.tran_cn: 粒子计数器；粒子计数管；颗粒测量计数器
粒径；颗粒直径，粒子直径
粒度分析仪，粒度分析器；颗粒大小分析仪
粒子速度；质点（振动）速度
悬浮颗粒；悬浮粒子；浮游质点

trans.tran_cn: 微粒，颗粒，[数，物]粒子，质点，极小量，小品词
trans.tran_en: a very small piece of something
